LanguageData.Bullet_BoltActionRifle.label: urchar (raidhfil boltála)

LanguageData.Bullet_SniperRifle.label: urchar (raidhfil snípéara)
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.label: raidhfil ionsaithe
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.description: Tá an an raidhfil ilfheidhmeach gásoibrithe seo iontaofa, cumhachtach agus cruinn.
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.tools.stock.label: TODO
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.tools.barrel.label: TODO
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: TODO
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.label: uathphiostal
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.description: Níl an piostal seo róchumhachtach, ach tá ráta lámhaigh ard aige.
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.tools.grip.label: greamán
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.tools.barrel.label: bairille
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: uathphiostal
LanguageData.Gun_BoltActionRifle.label: raidhfil boltála
LanguageData.Gun_BoltActionRifle.description: Tá raon ard ag an raidhfil seo, ach tá ráta lámhaigh íseal aige. Is minic go roghnaíonn sealgairí an gunna seo chun ainmhithe a mharú.
LanguageData.Gun_BoltActionRifle.tools.stock.label: stoc
LanguageData.Gun_BoltActionRifle.tools.barrel.label: bairille
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.label: gránghunna uathoibríoch
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.description: Tá an gránghunna seo iomlán uathoibríoch, agus tá ráta ard lámhaigh aige. Tá raon íseal aige, ach tá sé thar a bheith dáinséarach.
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.tools.stock.label: stoc
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.tools.barrel.label: bairille
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: gránghunna uathoibríoch
LanguageData.Gun_EmpLauncher.label: lainseálaí leictreamaighnéadach
LanguageData.Gun_EmpLauncher.description: Scaoileann an gaireas seo sliogán leictreamaighnéadach, a scriosann targaidí meicniúla (meicea-róbait, túiríní agus moirtéir).
LanguageData.Gun_EmpLauncher.tools.stock.label: TODO
LanguageData.Gun_EmpLauncher.tools.barrel.label: TODO
LanguageData.Gun_EmpLauncher.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: TODO
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.label: meaisínghunna beag
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.description: Tá an gunna seo beag, ach tá ráta lámhaigh ard aige agus tá sé cumhachtach. Tá raon íseal aige, áfach.
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.tools.grip.label: greamán
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.tools.barrel.label: bairille
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: meaisínghunna beag
LanguageData.Gun_IncendiaryLauncher.label: lainseálaí loiscneach
LanguageData.Gun_IncendiaryLauncher.description: Scaoileann an gaireas seo saigheada pléascacha.
LanguageData.Gun_IncendiaryLauncher.tools.stock.label: stoc
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.label: meaisínghunna mór
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.description: Tá an gunna gásoibrithe seo an-chumhachtach. Tá sé trom, ach tá sé an-éifeachtach i gcoinne grúpaí móra.
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.tools.stock.label: TODO
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.tools.barrel.label: TODO
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: TODO
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.label: meaisínphiostal
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.description: Tá an gunna seo éadrom, agus tá ráta lámhaigh ard aige. Níl sé róchumhachtach, áfach.
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.tools.grip.label: greamán
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.tools.barrel.label: bairille
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: meaisínphiostal
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.label: meaisínghunna ilbhairille
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.description: Tá an gunna seo ciotach agus trom, ach tá sé cumhachtach.
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.tools.barrels.label: bairillí
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: meaisínghunna ilbhairille
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.label: gránghunna
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.description: Tá an gunna seo cumhachtach, ach níl sé róchruinn agus níl sé ró-úsáideach ar raon fada.
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.tools.stock.label: stoc
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.tools.barrel.label: bairille
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: gránghunna
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.label: gunnán
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.description: Gunnán clasaiceach. Níl sé róchumhachtach, ach tá sé iontaofa go leor agus tá sé sách tapa.
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.tools.grip.label: greamán
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.tools.barrel.label: bairille
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: gunnán
LanguageData.Gun_SmokeLauncher.label: lainseálaí deataigh
LanguageData.Gun_SmokeLauncher.description: Úsáidtear an gléas seo chun diúracáin deataigh a leainseáil.
LanguageData.Gun_SmokeLauncher.tools.stock.label: stoc
LanguageData.Gun_SmokeLauncher.tools.barrel.label: bairille
LanguageData.Gun_SmokeLauncher.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: lainseálaí deataigh
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.label: raidhfil snípéara
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.description: Tá an raidhfil seo cumhachtach, cruinn agus iontaofa. Níl sé rómhaith ag raon gearr.
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.tools.stock.label: stoc
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.tools.barrel.label: bairille
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: raidhfil snípéara
